name: Forest Fire (chuteapps)
description:
Forest Fire is a roguelite destruction game with a simple objective: Burn as much as possible. This may or may not include; trees, animals, housing, and those pesky humans. Every pixel is physically simulated and will spread your flame far and wide. 

Don’t think you’ll burn unopposed. Mother nature has sent in a bullet-hell array of rain clouds and other obstacles to put an end to your destruction fest. Your flame must weave through the storm to survive.

This is a roguelite game so each run is different. However, we still maintain a sense of progression with persistent level up points. This means you get stronger, even if you die 5000 times.

The forest is vast and unending, with a myriad of secrets hidden within her. Are you ready to burn?

NOTE: The game is still in early development and I'll be releasing updates every week. I greatly appreciate your feedback during this period as I'm sure it will help shape the game! Thanks -Carl
